derivation: from the active participle (of the same form as the first word) feminine of an unused root (meaning to entrap) and plural of H6643 (צְבִי); trap of gazelles;
outline:
Pochereth of Zebaim = "here the cutting off"
  1. a servant of Solomon whose descendants returned from exile with Zerubbabel
strongs_def: Pokereth-Tsebajim, one of the 'servants of Solomon'
